data.name: DW Construction Group LLC
data.address: 1560 E Southlake Blvd Ste 100, Southlake, TX 76092

reviews.text: Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

"Communication throughout the entire process was very reassuring." "He dealt with the insurance company and set up all the appointments." "He was there first thing in the morning with his team to Tarp my roof."

DW Construction was the only company I wanted. The owner's name is Daryl and my son recommended him to me many months ago when I needed some projects done. He replaced the ceiling in my hall closet and he installed a 10x20 patio slab for … More Response from the owner 5 months ago Thank you so much for taking the time to share this with us, Vanessa. From the bottom of my heart we are incredibly grateful for your trust in DW Construction - and in me personally - to handle your projects and to be

Daryl is a solid guy that knows his stuff! He was in on the whole process from beginning to end and made sure everything was done to the highest of quality. He even got not only my roof covered but had interior and exterior paint covered. If you are searching for an awesome contractor with a great team reach out to Daryl today! Response from the owner 9 months ago

As first time home owners, we had no idea what we were doing when we had to file a claim for hail damage to our roof. Daryl and his team at DW Construction walked us through the steps and even went back and forth with our insurance company … More
